text.text: Here is a link to <https://re-act.org.uk/tech-support|submit a support ticket> :fist:

1. Try closing and re-opening your browser window.

2. Check that you are not using a VPN (Virtual Private Network).

3. Check that you have a stable internet connection.

If none of these things resolves your issues then <https://re-act.org.uk/tech-support|submit a support ticket> :mechanical-arm:
Here is a link to <https://re-act.org.uk/tech-support|submit a support ticket> :fist:
